title: The Fabulous Flamingo
description: Flamingos are known for their vibrant pink or reddish feathers, long legs, and an S-shaped neck. Their unique filter-feeding beaks are perfectly adapted for their diet.

questions.question: What is the main reason a flamingo is pink?
options: It is a result of their diet of algae and crustaceans
It is a form of protection
questions.correct_answer: It is a result of their diet of algae and crustaceans

questions.question: Why do flamingos often stand on one leg?
What is the collective noun for a group of flamingos?
How does a flamingo's beak work?
options: It acts like a straw to suck up water
It opens and closes like a pair of scissors
It filters out mud and water, leaving food behind
It has sharp edges for cutting food
questions.correct_answer: It filters out mud and water, leaving food behind
